tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.24
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT True output_data_MERGED $output_data_MERGED name SAGA.shapes_tools.24 INPUT $INPUT SRCINFO $SRCINFO MATCH $MATCH DELETE $DELETE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_MERGED $OutputSection_MERGED.outputType_MERGED transmissionMode_MERGED $OutputSection_MERGED.transmissionMode_MERGED

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Tables
param.help: The resulting table inherits its field structure from the first table in this list. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: SRCINFO
param.label: Add Source Information
param.help: Adds a field with the name of the original input data set.

param.name: DELETE
param.label: Delete
param.help: Deletes each input data set immediately after it has been merged, thus saving memory resources.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_MERGED
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
